channel.title: Welcome screen...?
channel.description: alright once you get logged into server... you know that little screen that pops up that says how many pk points you got and stuff? well my friend wants to know how to change ... if you could help out it would be great... thanks :)

item.title: Welcome screen...?
item.dc:creator: @Tead Tead
item.description:
@Tead wrote:

The text, IE
Welcome to Trev Scape,
Pk Points - 100
Deaths - 500

You’d open up Client.JAVA, search for " Welcome to Trev Scape,
Pk Points - 100
Deaths - 500 " and then change it.

Read full topic
